name: positiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being full of hope and confidence, or of giving cause for hope and confidence: The Scottish star said that he liked the positiveness of America. "There are pockets of hope and positiveness," she said of efforts to promote understanding between different faiths. See

positivity

What I enjoyed today was your youth and enthusiasm for life in your chosen career and of course your energy and positiveness. He commented that the positiveness of what diamonds have brought Botswana is just tremendous.
